html: When I was in college, my dad lost his job. On his own, he got the training he needed to find a new job but it took years. That’s why I’m proud to lead the BRIDGE for Workers Act to help individuals return to the workforce faster. It’s also my first bill to pass the House!pic.twitter.com/myIybU0yHL
text:
When I was in college, my dad lost his job. On his own, he got the training he needed to find a new job but it took years. That’s why I’m proud to lead the BRIDGE for Workers Act to help individuals return to the workforce faster. 

It’s also my first bill to pass the House!pic.twitter.com/myIybU0yHL

html: FACT: Latinos are more likely to suffer from: Diabetes Liver disease High blood pressure Obesity Asthma Cancer This #MinorityHealthMonth, let's pledge to reduce racial and ethnic health inequities in all minority communities.
text:
FACT: Latinos are more likely to suffer from:
Diabetes
Liver disease
High blood pressure
Obesity
Asthma
Cancer
This #MinorityHealthMonth, let's pledge to reduce racial and ethnic health inequities in all minority communities.

html: As measles outbreaks affect communities in the U.S. and around the world, we must collaborate with our global health partners like @MeaslesRubella, @Unicef, and @Gavi to support lifesaving immunizations and stop diseases at their source. #WorldImmunizationWeek #VaccinesWork.pic.twitter.com/5qvZo8TETR
text: As measles outbreaks affect communities in the U.S. and around the world, we must collaborate with our global health partners like @MeaslesRubella, @Unicef, and @Gavi to support lifesaving immunizations and stop diseases at their source. #WorldImmunizationWeek #VaccinesWork.pic.twitter.com/5qvZo8TETR

html: For #EarthDay, I hope you’ll join me and the Mescalero Apache Tribe in taking a moment to #TouchTheEarth. Mother Nature provides for us all and this annual celebration is a great reminder that it’s up to us to preserve and protect the Earth for generations to come.pic.twitter.com/Ux9X9LkE68
text:
For #EarthDay, I hope you’ll join me and the Mescalero Apache Tribe in taking a moment to #TouchTheEarth. 

Mother Nature provides for us all and this annual celebration is a great reminder that it’s up to us to preserve and protect the Earth for generations to come.pic.twitter.com/Ux9X9LkE68

html: Happy 80th Birthday @MosaicCompany! This week I toured their Potash Mine, a major employer in Carlsbad, NM. We also discussed concerns about housing, workforce shortages, and rural mental and emotional health resources in Southeast New Mexico.pic.twitter.com/gzLxYUqP5W
text:
Happy 80th Birthday @MosaicCompany! 

This week I toured their Potash Mine, a major employer in Carlsbad, NM. We also discussed concerns about housing, workforce shortages, and rural mental and emotional health resources in Southeast New Mexico.pic.twitter.com/gzLxYUqP5W

html: This morning I met with @Ecoservants and @AmeriCorps to discuss the work they’re doing at Wingfield Park in Ruidoso. They’re currently building a trail, cleaning up the grounds, and planting new trees and flowers. Thank you for making our community more beautiful!pic.twitter.com/KAYbXxUKsY
text:
This morning I met with @Ecoservants and @AmeriCorps to discuss the work they’re doing at Wingfield Park in Ruidoso. They’re currently building a trail, cleaning up the grounds, and planting new trees and flowers. 

Thank you for making our community more beautiful!pic.twitter.com/KAYbXxUKsY

html: Access to the Internet is no longer a luxury, it's a modern necessity. It's how our kids complete their homework, how small biz expands their reach and thrive, and how our rural elderly can stay healthy by using long-distance healthcare. I'm proud to support the #SaveTheNet Act.pic.twitter.com/8tfjYfSBGp
text: Access to the Internet is no longer a luxury, it's a modern necessity. It's how our kids complete their homework, how small biz expands their reach and thrive, and how our rural elderly can stay healthy by using long-distance healthcare. I'm proud to support the #SaveTheNet Act.pic.twitter.com/8tfjYfSBGp

html: Growing up in the desert, I learned at an early age that water is scarce and water matters for our future. New Mexicans depend on clean water for our food, for our communities, and for our growth. We must #ProtectCleanWater.pic.twitter.com/bB47n8niQG
text: Growing up in the desert, I learned at an early age that water is scarce and water matters for our future. New Mexicans depend on clean water for our food, for our communities, and for our growth. We must #ProtectCleanWater.pic.twitter.com/bB47n8niQG

text:
Thank you @USHCC for having @RepDMP @RepSylviaGarcia @priscialva & I this morning for an #InHerFootsteps panel on empowering Latinas in leadership!

html: Last week, @BennieGThompson and I sent this letter to DHS Sec Nielsen following the Administration’s decision to build new border wall in remote southern NM. We hope the Sec will reconsider this shortsighted decision and work w/ Congress on effective & efficient border securitypic.twitter.com/QOuacEOS75
text:
Last week, @BennieGThompson and I sent this letter to DHS Sec Nielsen following the Administration’s decision to build new border wall in remote southern NM. 

We hope the Sec will reconsider this shortsighted decision and work w/ Congress on effective & efficient border securitypic.twitter.com/QOuacEOS75

Equal pay is not just a women’s issue, it’s a family issue.

html: “Family separation should never be a solution for our broken immigration system. It is immoral, and we know it results in traumatic and lasting effects on families.” - @RepTorresSmall in @HomelandDems hearing on Trump’s cruel family separation policy. #EndFamilySeparationpic.twitter.com/i8i4h8Kr83
text: “Family separation should never be a solution for our broken immigration system. html: Yesterday I questioned @ActingSecDef on the DOD's inadequate response to PFAS contaminations in our military bases in NM & around the world. This is putting is putting the health of New Mexicans & their livestock at risk. We need to protect NM's access to safe, clean water.pic.twitter.com/vKwNzRIRDO
text:
Yesterday I questioned @ActingSecDef on the DOD's inadequate response to PFAS contaminations in our military bases in NM & around the world. 

This is putting is putting the health of New Mexicans & their livestock at risk. We need to protect NM's access to safe, clean water.pic.twitter.com/vKwNzRIRDO

html: Congratulations to the city of Socorro for their $7.89 million @usdaRD grant and loan award! This investment will allow Socorro to make some much-needed repairs and upgrades to their wastewater infrastructure. You can read more here:https://bit.ly/2HIrg4w
text:
Congratulations to the city of Socorro for their $7.89 million @usdaRD grant and loan award! 

This investment will allow Socorro to make some much-needed repairs and upgrades to their wastewater infrastructure.

You can read more here:https://bit.ly/2HIrg4w

html: My thoughts are with those affected by yesterday’s dangerous storms and tornadoes in southeast New Mexico. I'll be in the area this weekend to talk with folks about how I can help. Residents can also keep track of weather alerts and closures via @NMDHSEM.

html: I’m also proud to announce that the bipartisan #EveryKidOutdoors Act, which I co-sponsored, has also been signed into law! Now all fourth graders and their families will have the opportunity to enjoy our nation’s parks, historic sites, and #PublicLands, free of charge.
text: I’m also proud to announce that the bipartisan #EveryKidOutdoors Act, which I co-sponsored, has also been signed into law! Now all fourth graders and their families will have the opportunity to enjoy our nation’s parks, historic sites, and #PublicLands, free of charge.

html: BIG NEWS: The Organ Mountains-Desert Peaks Conservation Act is now law! The passage of the historic #PublicLands package ensures that our public lands are protected for future generations to enjoy. #OMDP4NM #WildernessNOWpic.twitter.com/UTHiKs0TLH
text:
BIG NEWS: The Organ Mountains-Desert Peaks Conservation Act is now law! 

The passage of the historic #PublicLands package ensures that our public lands are protected for future generations to enjoy. #OMDP4NM #WildernessNOWpic.twitter.com/UTHiKs0TLH

html: New Mexico is home to over 6000 #Dreamers that contribute $16 million in state and local taxes to NM each year. They are a part of our community - they are our friends, neighbors, and colleagues. I’m proud to #ProtectTheDream and cosponsor #HR6 here in Congress.pic.twitter.com/9ln5BojbTG
text: New Mexico is home to over 6000 #Dreamers that contribute $16 million in state and local taxes to NM each year. They are a part of our community - they are our friends, neighbors, and colleagues. I’m proud to #ProtectTheDream and cosponsor #HR6 here in Congress.pic.twitter.com/9ln5BojbTG

html: On #InternationalWomensDay, we celebrate and empower all women! Meet Ellen Ochoa, aka @Astro_Ellen, the first Hispanic woman in space! She went on to direct the Johnson Space Center. She’s a trailblazer for so many Latinas - thank you Ellen! #WomensHistoryMonth #IWD2019pic.twitter.com/fANEREWHkI
text:
On #InternationalWomensDay, we celebrate and empower all women!

Meet Ellen Ochoa, aka @Astro_Ellen, the first Hispanic woman in space! She went on to direct the Johnson Space Center. She’s a trailblazer for so many Latinas - thank you Ellen!

#WomensHistoryMonth
#IWD2019pic.twitter.com/fANEREWHkI

html: Only a #bipartisan effort will end the #governmentshutdown. Yesterday, I along with other colleagues, called on the leadership of both parties to come together, end the shutdown, and commit to finding long term solutions to the real challenges we face on the border.
text: Only a #bipartisan effort will end the #governmentshutdown.   Yesterday, I along with other colleagues, called on the leadership of both parties to come together, end the shutdown, and commit to finding long term solutions to the real challenges we face on the border.

html: Needless to say, I was extremely disappointed by SCOTUS’ decision allowing the transgender ban to go into effect. html: Our women and men in uniform put their lives on the line to defend our country and its freedoms. Anyone qualified, able, and willing to make the ultimate sacrifice for our country should be allowed to serve free from discrimination.
text: Our women and men in uniform put their lives on the line to defend our country and its freedoms. Anyone qualified, able, and willing to make the ultimate sacrifice for our country should be allowed to serve free from discrimination.

html: This week, 2 forest fires broke out in Lincoln County. Members of the BIA's​ Wildland Fire Management team responded. Because of the #governmentshutdown these responders, who are battling dangerous conditions, aren't being paid. They deserve better!https://tinyurl.com/ycrwukcs
text: This week, 2 forest fires broke out in Lincoln County.  Members of the BIA's​ Wildland Fire Management team responded.  Because of the #governmentshutdown these responders, who are battling dangerous conditions, aren't being paid. They deserve better!https://tinyurl.com/ycrwukcs

html: On my way back to DC, and I’m reminded of the TSA agent I met on my way home last weekend. He stopped to tell me that he was raising his grandson and not receiving a paycheck was putting a squeeze on their household. Our federal employees deserve better! #ShutdownStories
text: On my way back to DC, and I’m reminded of the TSA agent I met on my way home last weekend. He stopped to tell me that he was raising his grandson and not receiving a paycheck was putting a squeeze on their household. Our federal employees deserve better! #ShutdownStories

html: Spent time in Luna and Hidalgo counties yesterday talking with electeds, ranchers, small business owners, health care workers, and other community members about the challenges facing rural southern NM, particularly border security, health care access, and infrastructure.pic.twitter.com/hXTa7l589N
text: Spent time in Luna and Hidalgo counties yesterday talking with electeds, ranchers, small business owners, health care workers, and other community members about the challenges facing rural southern NM, particularly border security, health care access, and infrastructure.pic.twitter.com/hXTa7l589N

html: Celebrating #MLKDay and honoring Dr. King’s life and legacy with the @NAACP Doña Ana Chapter this morning. At this critical time in our nation’s history, it is as important now than ever that we practice Dr. King’s teachings on respect, justice, and equality.pic.twitter.com/0Ck1c95L5q
text: Celebrating #MLKDay and honoring Dr. King’s life and legacy with the @NAACP Doña Ana Chapter this morning. At this critical time in our nation’s history, it is as important now than ever that we practice Dr. King’s teachings on respect, justice, and equality.pic.twitter.com/0Ck1c95L5q

html: In the mean time, I’ve spoken with employees at our federal prisons, border patrol agents and customs officers, air traffic controllers, and TSA agents. They're working hard even though the government is failing them. It's time we do our job.
text: In the mean time, I’ve spoken with employees at our federal prisons, border patrol agents and customs officers, air traffic controllers, and TSA agents. They're working hard even though the government is failing them. It's time we do our job.

html: This proposal does not "solve" the crisis at the border. We also need to discuss manpower and infrastructure at our ports, permanent status for DREAMers, expanded work visas and a safer, more orderly process for people presenting at our border
text: This proposal does not "solve" the crisis at the border.  We also need to discuss manpower and infrastructure at our ports, permanent status for DREAMers,  expanded work visas and a safer, more orderly process for people presenting at our border

html: I am glad to see the President identify issues he is willing to discuss, but the temporary provisions he outlined don’t solve our long-term problems and broken border policy.
text: I am glad to see the President identify issues he is willing to discuss, but the temporary provisions he outlined don’t solve our long-term problems and broken border policy.

html: New Mexicans are sick of politicians squabbling over speeches and flights. We need everyone at the table to get our government back on track
text: New Mexicans are sick of politicians squabbling over speeches and flights.  We need everyone at the table to get our government back on track

html: Started the weekend at home meeting with @RepEscobar and labor members talking with them about the real effects the #GovernmentShutdown is having on them and the regionpic.twitter.com/7Fa3n17LvD
text: Started the weekend at home meeting with  @RepEscobar and labor members talking with them about the real effects the #GovernmentShutdown is having on them and the regionpic.twitter.com/7Fa3n17LvD

html: These men and women are our country's "first line of defense against opioids or other illegal drugs entering the country." They deserve better.
text: These men and women are our country's "first line of defense against opioids or other illegal drugs entering the country."  They deserve better.

html: Customs officers, like the one I spoke to while at home last weekend, shouldn't have to tell trainees to open a credit card and keep a 0 balance because there has been a shutdown each year she has worked for CBP #ShutdownStories
text: Customs officers, like the one I spoke to while at home last weekend, shouldn't have to tell trainees to open a credit card and keep a 0 balance because there has been a shutdown each year she has worked for CBP #ShutdownStories

html: Today, marks the end of the 4th week of the #GovernmentShutdown. New Mexicans can't afford this shutdown any longer. #shutdownstorieshttps://www.ruidosonews.com/story/news/local/community/2019/01/03/new-mexico-2nd-most-affected-government-shutdown/2473147002/ …
text: Today, marks the end of the 4th week of the #GovernmentShutdown.  New Mexicans can't afford this shutdown any longer. #shutdownstorieshttps://www.ruidosonews.com/story/news/local/community/2019/01/03/new-mexico-2nd-most-affected-government-shutdown/2473147002/ …

html: @realDonaldTrump, this is my #counteroffer. It's time to work across party lines to move on real border security measures and #EndTheShutdown
text: @realDonaldTrump, this is my #counteroffer.  It's time to work across party lines to move on real border security measures and #EndTheShutdown

html: We do need to fix our immigration system. In fact, I believe a fundamental piece of border security is a clear and moral immigration system. Lets invest in work visas, pass legal protection for DREAMers, and have a faster, fairer process to assess asylum claims #counteroffer
text: We do need to fix our immigration system.  In fact, I believe a fundamental piece of border security is a clear and moral immigration system. Lets invest in work visas, pass legal protection for DREAMers, and have a faster, fairer process to assess asylum claims #counteroffer

html: @realDonaldTrump, you’ve said specifically that “the system has been broken for many years, the immigration system… we’re gonna try and see if we can fix it” and that “all Americans are hurt by uncontrolled illegal migration.”
text: @realDonaldTrump, you’ve said specifically that “the system has been broken for many years, the immigration system… we’re gonna try and see if we can fix it” and that “all Americans are hurt by uncontrolled illegal migration.”

html: Immigration System: @realDonaldTrump, @SpeakerPelosi, @senatemajldr, @SenSchumer, and @kevinomccarthy all agree, each have said that our immigration system is “broken.”
text: Immigration System: @realDonaldTrump, @SpeakerPelosi, @senatemajldr, @SenSchumer, and @kevinomccarthy all agree, each have said that our immigration system is “broken.”

html: It is a tremendous problem, & we need to secure our border to prevent violent criminals & traffickers from crossing it. This is why we should invest $49 million for 275 new Domestic Investigation agents to look into human trafficking, drug trade, and gang activity #counterofferpic.twitter.com/HiWTZbUI1q
text: It is a tremendous problem, & we need to secure our border to prevent violent criminals & traffickers from crossing it.  This is why we should invest $49 million for 275 new Domestic Investigation agents to look into human trafficking, drug trade, and gang activity #counterofferpic.twitter.com/HiWTZbUI1q

html: @realDonaldTrump, you’ve said “my administration has presented Congress with a detailed proposal to secure the border and stop the criminal gangs, drug smugglers, and human traffickers. It’s a tremendous problem.”
text: @realDonaldTrump, you’ve said “my administration has presented Congress with a detailed proposal to secure the border and stop the criminal gangs, drug smugglers, and human traffickers. It’s a tremendous problem.”

html: Domestic Threats: In 2016, approx. 174 people died/day from drug poisoning. In 2017, nearly 30,000 people died just from synthetic opioid use alone. And human trafficking is the fastest-growing organized crime activity in the US, making almost $32 billion a year for traffickers.
text: Domestic Threats: In 2016, approx. 174 people died/day from drug poisoning. In 2017, nearly 30,000 people died just from synthetic opioid use alone. And human trafficking is the fastest-growing organized crime activity in the US, making almost $32 billion a year for traffickers.

html: Lets do it. Ive seen firsthand why we do need medical support along the border. It’s unacceptable that 2 children died in US custody. Lets invest the $17 mill for 112 new ICE Health Service Corps staff to improve healthcare services in detention facilities #counterofferpic.twitter.com/qFdMXsUuJs
text: Lets do it. Ive seen firsthand why we do need medical support along the border. It’s unacceptable that 2 children died in US custody. Lets invest the $17 mill for 112 new ICE Health Service Corps staff to improve healthcare services in detention facilities #counterofferpic.twitter.com/qFdMXsUuJs

html: @realDonaldTrump, you’ve said your “plan also contains an urgent request for humanitarian assistance and medical support.”
text: @realDonaldTrump, you’ve said your “plan also contains an urgent request for humanitarian assistance and medical support.”

html: Medical support: DHS Sec. Nielsen has said that circumstances along the border have been “exacerbated by the increase in persons…suffering from severe respiratory illnesses or exhibit some other illness” and that it is “difficult for our personnel to be first responders”
text: Medical support: DHS Sec. Nielsen has said that circumstances along the border have been “exacerbated by the increase in persons…suffering from severe respiratory illnesses or exhibit some other illness” and that it is “difficult for our personnel to be first responders”

html: Today is the first #payday that federal employees will miss because of the #shutdown. This morning I asked for my pay to be withheld until the #shutdown ends.pic.twitter.com/cDinKOcf3u
text: Today is the first #payday that federal employees will miss because of the #shutdown. This morning I asked for my pay to be withheld until the #shutdown ends.pic.twitter.com/cDinKOcf3u

html: NM is one of the state's hardest hit by the #shutdown. I voted "yay" on #S24 which ensures that federal employees will receive back pay. Still work to be done. Thousands of gov. contractors and private citizens that rely on our federal gov. for business are losing wages
text: NM is one of the state's hardest hit by the #shutdown.  I voted "yay" on #S24 which ensures that federal employees will receive back pay.  Still work to be done. Thousands of gov. contractors and private citizens that rely on our federal gov. for business are losing wages

html: A government contractor that works w/ air traffic control in Roswell and is affected by the #shutdown called into our DC office, so I jumped on the phone with him to learn more about his situation and talk with him about how and why we need to end this #shutdownpic.twitter.com/ZPh3H4416J
text: A government contractor that works w/ air traffic control in Roswell and is affected by the #shutdown called into our DC office, so I jumped on the phone with him to learn more about his situation and talk with him about how and why we need to end this #shutdownpic.twitter.com/ZPh3H4416J

html: Some highlights from #SwearinginDay. It was a privilege to spend the day and share so many amazing memories with my family and constituents!https://vimeo.com/310239631
text: Some highlights from #SwearinginDay. It was a privilege to spend the day and share so many amazing memories with my family and constituents!https://vimeo.com/310239631

html: #Strong #smart and #fair investments in border security are in methods that are proven to be effective: technology, personnel, training, and medical equipment. Investments that will help to keep children and families, agents, and our communities safe
text: #Strong #smart and #fair investments in border security are in methods that are proven to be effective: technology, personnel, training, and medical equipment. Investments that will help to keep children and families, agents, and our communities safe

html: We heard nothing new from the President last evening. The border is my home, and I am committed to fighting for and implementing policies which will help to make it #strong #smart and #fair
text: We heard nothing new from the President last evening. The border is my home, and I am committed to fighting for and implementing policies which will help to make it #strong #smart and #fair

html: This will help to make our border strong, smart, and fair, as well as keep families and children, agents, and communities safe.
text: This will help to make our border strong, smart, and fair, as well as keep families and children, agents, and communities safe.

html: but more importantly, we learned what issues still need to be addressed to prevent tragedies like these from happening again. At this critical juncture for our border security and immigration systems, it is crucial that we come together to develop solutions to these challenges.
text: but more importantly, we learned what issues still need to be addressed to prevent tragedies like these from happening again. At this critical juncture for our border security and immigration systems, it is crucial that we come together to develop solutions to these challenges.

text: Today provided valuable insight into the circumstances surrounding Felipe Gomez-Alonzo's tragic death. We learned of the improvements that CPB has made over the past month to help improve the medical care of those in their custody…
